• Nutritional management of minor ailments such as nausea, vomiting, constipation and heartburn
• Nutritional management of nutrition-related chronic illnesses such as hypertension and diabetes
• Nutritional counselling and support to identify and promote the consumption of an adequate, quality
nutrient-dense diet based on locally produced/available foods.
